Class FirebaseEvents

java.lang.Object
com.example.marill_many_events.models.FirebaseEvents
public class FirebaseEvents extends Object
Manage firebase operations for events

  • Constructor Details

    • FirebaseEvents

      public FirebaseEvents(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore firestore, com.google.firebase.storage.StorageReference storageReference, String deviceId, EventsCallback eventsCallback)
      Constructs a FirebaseEvents object to manage Firestore and Firebase Storage operations.
      Parameters:
      firestore - The Firestore database instance.
      storageReference - The Firebase Storage reference.
      deviceId - The device ID or unique identifier for the user or facility.
      eventsCallback - The callback interface for event-related operations.

      Deletes an event from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The Firestore document ID of the event to delete.

    • updateID

      Registers a new user and uploads the profile picture to Firebase Storage if provided.

      Upload profile picture URL to firestore under a user's profilepictureurl field.

    • generateRandomFilename

      public String generateRandomFilename()
      Generates a random filename for file uploads.
      Returns:
      A unique filename with a timestamp and UUID.
